definition: racing bicycle/sporting bicycle/sports car/logging truck/on the job (of a train conductor)
to run/to run away/to escape/to run around (on errands etc)/(of a gas or liquid) to leak or evaporate/(verb complement) away/off
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
supercar/abbr. to 超跑|超跑[chao1 pao3]

sentences.english: Think sports cars and flashy SUVs depreciate the most?
sentences.chinese: 以爲跑車，奢華的越野車折價得最多嗎？

sentences.english: Steve borrowed his dad's sports car to impress his girlfriend.
sentences.chinese: 史蒂夫借來他爸爸的跑車以討得女友歡心。

sentences.english: “Forever” multiple speed racing bicycles are sure to be salable in your market.
sentences.chinese: 永久牌變速跑車在你們的市場上一定很暢銷。

sentences.english: In the end, the results of research in western subu…
sentences.chinese: 最後給出在北京西郊跑車實驗的結果。

sentences.english: You know, girls of my age fancy sports car these days.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，現在像我這麼大的女孩子都在開跑車。

sentences.english: Hank fixed his sights on a 15-year-old sports car.
sentences.chinese: 漢克卻獨獨對一輛已有十五年車齡的跑車很欣賞。

sentences.english: Based in Crewe, England, Bentley is also getting ready to launch a sports car.
sentences.chinese: 總部在英國克魯郡的賓利汽車還準備推出一款跑車。

sentences.english: Famed British sports car marque MG has been acquired by the Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 著名英國跑車MG型號已經被中國人持有。

sentences.english: Today, that little roadster is one of the true joys of my life.
sentences.chinese: 如今，這輛小跑車是我生命中真正的快樂。

sentences.english: The company says there are now one thousand three hundred Roadsters being driven around the world.
sentences.chinese: 該公司表示，現在有一千三百在世界各地推動的跑車。

sentences.english: This essay comes from a coupe reverse engineering project.
sentences.chinese: 本課題來源於某轎跑車逆向設計項目。

sentences.english: Rent a fast sports car and speed down the Autobahn.
sentences.chinese: 租一輛快速跑車在高速公路上跑一回。

sentences.english: We can‘t afford that expensive sports car.
sentences.chinese: 我們買不起那輛昂貴的跑車。

sentences.english: Our friends were whirled away in Hunter's sports-car.
sentences.chinese: 亨特的跑車迅速帶走了我們的朋友。

sentences.english: The show features a sports car with the Confederate battle flag painted on top.
sentences.chinese: 該劇以一臺噴塗了邦聯戰旗的跑車爲特色。

sentences.english: The boys drooled over the sports cars in the showroom.
sentences.chinese: 那些男孩給陳列室裏的跑車迷住了。

definition: one's own car (or motorbike)/vehicle for one's private use
enclosed carriage for carrying passengers/motor carriage/car or bus/limousine/CL:部[bu4],輛|辆[liang4]
car or other vehicle (bicycle, truck etc)
